column1: The  said  Section  which  reads,  "No  person  suspected  or  accused  of an
offence  under  Section  54A  or  Section  54B  of this  Ordinance  shall  be  released  on

bail,  except  by 
the  High  Court 
in  exceptional  circumstances",  and  as  such

imposes  a 
limitation  on  the  discretion  of  Courts, 
in  explicit  terms,  of
granting bail to the class of suspects or accused it had specified, should be
